p: In acetone extract and fractions, we observed that the inhibition activity is dispersed as follows: SA5 > SA10 > FA > SA2 > SA1 > SA4. The first group of fractions composed of SA5 and SA10 had a much higher activity than FA with IC 50 remarkably close to BHA ( Table 7). The second group composed of SA2, SA1, and SA4 exhibited weaker antioxidant activities than FA.
